summary.span: 為所有的活動設計工具元件提供強制基底類別 (Base Class)。

span.span: Provides a mandatory base class for all activity designer components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 所有的活動設計工具元件會衍生自 。All activity designer components derive from . 提供了較簡單的設計工具，這個工具可讓使用者在設計模式中以視覺方式設計活動。The provides a simple designer which lets the user visually design activities in the design mode. 為活動提供了簡易的機制，讓它們可以參與在設計介面上呈現工作流程。 provides a simple mechanism for the activities so they can participate in rendering the workflow on the design surface. 讓使用者可以自訂與活動相關聯的配置和繪製。 lets the user customize layout and drawing associated with the activity. 讓使用者可以延伸與活動相關聯的中繼資料。 lets the user extend the metadata associated with the activity. ## Examples 下列範例顯示自訂活動的 完整實作。The following example shows a complete implementation of an for a custom activity. 設計工具擁有一個旗標，這個旗標可以切換以允許 基底類別控制繪製或利用 類別用來繪製活動的各種方法。The designer has a flag that can be toggled to allow the base class to control the painting or to utilize the various methods the class to draw the activity. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDragEnter(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDragEnter (e As ActivityDragEventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 當正在進行拖放作業且指標進入設計工具界限內時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the drag-drop operation is in progress and the pointer enters the designer bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當滑鼠拖曳到設計工具內時，就會引發 事件。The event is raised when the mouse is dragged into the designer. 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 如果設計工具為有效的置放目標 (Drop Target)，則會以指定的拖放效果引發 事件。If the designer is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤指標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠註解狀態的變更。Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse comment state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出設計工具中繫結，則會引發 事件。If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入其他設計工具，則會引發該設計工具的 。If the mouse enters another designer, the for that designer is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是仍在相同的設計工具內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the event is raised. - 如果鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態有變動，會引發 事件，並根據 事件的 [動作] 屬性值，決定要繼續拖曳、置放資料，還是取消作業。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event . 如果值為 `DragAction.Continue`，會引發 事件以繼續作業，並引發具有新效果的 事件，以設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件是成對的，因此，當滑鼠在置放目標上移動時，會提供使用者最新的滑鼠位置回應。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position. 如果值為 `DragAction.Drop`，置放效果值就會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式即可在來源資料中執行適當作業，例如，如果作業是移動時則顯示資料註解。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, see comment the data if the operation was a move. 如果值為 `DragAction.Cancel`，則會引發 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDragLeave() cil managed

summary.span: 當正在進行拖放作業且指標離開設計工具界限時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the drag-drop operation is in progress and the pointer leaves the designer bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者將指標拖離設計工具或取消目前的拖放作業時，將引發 事件。The event is raised when the user drags the pointer out of the designer or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation. 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 如果設計工具為有效的置放目標 (Drop Target)，則會以指定的拖放效果引發 事件。If the designer is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤指標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕的變更。Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出設計工具中繫結，則會引發 事件。If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入其他設計工具，則會引發該設計工具的 。If the mouse enters another designer, the for that designer is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是仍在相同的設計工具內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the event is raised. - 如果鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態有變動，會引發 事件，並根據 事件的 [動作] 屬性值，決定要繼續拖曳、置放資料，還是取消作業。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event . 如果值為 `DragAction.Continue`，會引發 事件以繼續作業，並引發具有新效果的 事件，以設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件是成對的，因此，當滑鼠在置放目標上移動時，會提供使用者最新的滑鼠位置回應。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position. 如果值為 `DragAction.Drop`，置放效果值就會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式即可在來源資料中執行適當作業，例如，如果作業是移動時則剪下資料。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果值為 `DragAction.Cancel`，則會引發 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 更新當執行拖曳作業時提供給使用者的回應視覺提示。

span.span: Updates the visual cues for feedback supplied to the user when performing a drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 如果設計工具為有效的置放目標 (Drop Target)，則會以指定的拖放效果引發 事件。If the designer is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. - 系統會追蹤指標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕的變更。Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出設計工具中繫結，則會引發 事件。If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入其他設計工具，則會引發該設計工具的 。If the mouse enters another designer, the for that designer is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是仍在相同的設計工具內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the event is raised. - 如果鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態有變動，會引發 事件，並根據 事件的 [動作] 屬性值，決定要繼續拖曳、置放資料，還是取消作業。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event . 如果值為 `DragAction.Continue`，會引發 事件以繼續作業，並引發具有新效果的 事件，以設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件是成對的，因此，當滑鼠在置放目標上移動時，會提供使用者最新的滑鼠位置回應。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position. 如果值為 `DragAction.Drop`，置放效果值就會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式即可在來源資料中執行適當作業，例如，如果作業是移動時則剪下資料。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果值為 `DragAction.Cancel`，則會引發 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 發生於當滑鼠初次進入設計工具界限時。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse first enters the designer bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 如果設計工具為有效的置放目標 (Drop Target)，則會以指定的拖放效果引發 事件。If the designer is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. - 系統會追蹤指標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕的變更。Changes in the pointer position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出設計工具中繫結，則會引發 事件。If the user moves out of the designer bounds, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入其他設計工具，則會引發該設計工具的 。If the mouse enters another designer, the for that designer is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是仍在相同的設計工具內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same designer, the event is raised. - 如果鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態有變動，會引發 事件，並根據 事件的 [動作] 屬性值，決定要繼續拖曳、置放資料，還是取消作業。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the Action property of the event . 如果值為 `DragAction.Continue`，會引發 事件以繼續作業，並引發具有新效果的 事件，以設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value is `DragAction.Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和 事件是成對的，因此，當滑鼠在置放目標上移動時，會提供使用者最新的滑鼠位置回應。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is supplied with the most up to date feedback on the mouse position. 如果值為 `DragAction.Drop`，置放效果值就會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式即可在來源資料中執行適當作業，例如，如果作業是移動時則剪下資料。If the value is `DragAction.Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so that the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. 如果值為 `DragAction.Cancel`，則會引發 事件。If the value is `DragAction.Cancel`, the event is raised. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 Verbs 方法來判斷要在 [操作功能表] 上顯示的動詞。Use the Verbs method to determine the verbs to show on the Context Menu. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何覆寫 屬性，以便插入 的自訂動詞動作。The following example demonstrates how to override the property to insert custom verb actions for a . `CreateActivityVerbs` 會建立名稱為 的新 `"Add New Parallel Branch"`，並與名稱為 `OnAddParallelBranch` 的事件處理常式產生關聯。The `CreateActivityVerbs` creates a new named `"Add New Parallel Branch"` and associates an event handler named `OnAddParallelBranch`. 在工作流程設計工具中按一下此動詞時，會呼叫事件處理常式。When the verb is clicked in the workflow designer, the event handler is called.
